question: How much did Apple earn from its Services division (iCloud, App Store, Apple Music, AppleCare) in FY2024?

What was Apple's gross profit margin percentage in FY2024?
How many full-time employees did Apple have at the end of FY2024?
Apple is one of the most profitable companies on Earth. What was its net income in FY2024?

YouTube is the world's largest video platform. How much did YouTube generate in advertising revenue alone in FY2024?

Despite massive losses, Meta's Reality Labs does generate some revenue from Quest headset and app sales. How much revenue did Reality Labs earn in FY2024?
Nearly all of Meta's revenue comes from advertising. How much did Meta's 'Family of Apps' segment generate in advertising revenue in FY2024?

AWS is Amazon's profit engine. What was AWS's operating income in FY2024?

Amazon is one of the world's largest private employers, including warehouse workers. How many employees did Amazon have at the end of FY2024?
Between e-commerce, AWS, advertising, and Prime, what was Amazon's total net sales in FY2024?
Amazon went from barely profitable to highly profitable. What was Amazon's net income in FY2024?
Amazon invests heavily in fulfillment centers, data centers, and transportation. What was Amazon's capital expenditure (purchases of property and equipment) in FY2024?

What was Microsoft's net income in FY2024 (ended June 2024)?

Between subscriptions and its new ad tier, what was Netflix's total revenue in FY2024?

Sweetgreen has been expanding beyond its East Coast roots. How many locations did the chain operate at the end of 2024?

What was the average annual revenue per Sweetgreen restaurant in 2024 — also known as average unit volume (AUV)?

Cava has been on a tear opening new locations. How many restaurants did Cava operate at the end of 2024?

Cava's same-restaurant sales growth in 2024 was the envy of the industry. What was the percentage increase?

What was Allbirds' peak annual revenue, reached in 2022 before the steep decline began?

Oatly has been working to improve its unit economics. What was the company's gross margin percentage in 2024?

What was Beyond Meat's peak annual revenue, achieved in 2021 during the height of plant-based mania?

Beyond Meat's gross margin has been under severe pressure. What was the company's gross margin percentage in 2024?

How many subscribers did the Hims & Hers telehealth platform have at the end of 2024?

Hims & Hers was one of the fastest-growing consumer health companies. What was their year-over-year revenue growth rate in 2024?

How many company-operated stores did Lululemon have worldwide at the end of fiscal year 2024?

How many active customers did Chewy have at the end of fiscal year 2024?

Uber reported record annual revenue in 2024. Across rides, delivery, and freight, how much total revenue did Uber pull in for FY2024?
Uber's Mobility segment (ride-hailing) is its original business. How much revenue did Uber Mobility generate in FY2024?
Uber Eats competes head-to-head with DoorDash. How much revenue did Uber's Delivery segment generate in FY2024?
Uber's gross bookings represent the total dollar value of all transactions on its platform before Uber takes its cut. What were Uber's total gross bookings in FY2024?
Uber tracks 'Monthly Active Platform Consumers' — unique users who completed at least one ride or delivery order in a month. What was Uber's average MAPC in Q4 2024?
Spotify is the world's largest audio streaming platform. How much total revenue did Spotify generate in FY2024?
Spotify makes money from subscriptions and ads. How much revenue came from Premium subscriptions in FY2024?
Spotify's ad-supported tier generates revenue from audio and display ads served to free users. How much ad-supported revenue did Spotify earn in FY2024?
Spotify Premium subscribers pay a monthly fee for ad-free listening and offline downloads. How many Premium subscribers did Spotify have at the end of 2024?
Spotify counts both free and paying listeners as Monthly Active Users. How many MAUs did Spotify report at the end of Q4 2024?
Spotify historically had thin margins due to royalty payments. What was Spotify's gross margin percentage for FY2024?
DoorDash is the leading food delivery platform in the US. How much total revenue did DoorDash generate in FY2024?
DoorDash's Marketplace GOV (Gross Order Value) represents the total value of all orders placed through its platform. What was DoorDash's Marketplace GOV in FY2024?
Every time someone places a food, grocery, or convenience order on DoorDash, it counts as one order. How many total orders did DoorDash process in FY2024?
DoorDash's take rate is the percentage of Marketplace GOV it keeps as revenue. What was DoorDash's approximate take rate in FY2024?
DoorDash was famously unprofitable for years after its IPO. What was DoorDash's net income (or loss) for FY2024?
Airbnb disrupted the hotel industry with its peer-to-peer home rental marketplace. How much total revenue did Airbnb generate in FY2024?
Airbnb's Gross Booking Value represents the total dollar amount of bookings made on the platform. What was Airbnb's GBV in FY2024?
Airbnb measures demand through 'Nights and Experiences Booked.' How many nights and experiences were booked on Airbnb in FY2024?
Airbnb has become highly profitable since its pandemic-era IPO. What was Airbnb's net income in FY2024?
Airbnb charges service fees to both hosts and guests. What was Airbnb's approximate take rate (revenue as a percentage of GBV) in FY2024?

Snapchat measures engagement through Daily Active Users. How many DAUs did Snapchat report at the end of Q4 2024?

Snap has struggled to reach profitability since going public in 2017. What was Snap's net loss in FY2024?

Pinterest turned a corner on profitability in recent years. What was Pinterest's net income for FY2024?
Pinterest earns far more per user in the US than internationally. What was Pinterest's global average ARPU in FY2024?

Shopify charges merchants a monthly subscription fee to use its platform. How much subscription revenue did Shopify earn in FY2024?
Shopify's take rate is revenue as a percentage of GMV processed through its platform. What was Shopify's approximate take rate in FY2024?

Roblox has invested heavily in its platform and developer payouts. What was Roblox's net loss in FY2024?
